channel.title: Honda Accord Question
channel.description:
I currently own a 2005 Honda Accord and I didn't get it with the nav or the leather seats. What I want to know is if I buy the nanvigation system if I can have Honda put it in for me? http://cgi.ebay.com/ebaymotors/2005-Honda-Accord-Hybrid-Navigation-6-CD-Radio-OEM-LKQ_W0QQitemZ200374064895QQcmdZViewItemQQptZCar_Audio_Video?hash=item2ea73996ff&_trksid=p4506.c0.m245
I would just buy an aftermarket kendwood touch screen but they dont make a double din kit for where I want it so any ideas on what I can do?

item.title: Honda Accord Question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:3, topic:300126”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=396408.msg2944448#msg2944448 date=1252125636]
Wouldn’t that be a question to ask the honda dealer?

You can make your own kit if all you need to do is adapt a size.
[/quote]

Yeah, but where the current radio is at they have the air conditioning nobs built into it. I would consider a 1 dim pop out screen but then the screen would be getting hit by the air conditioner.[/quote]

There really wouldn’t be a problem with air conditioner air hitting the screen.

Read full topic
